snippet: Gen. Jamea Jamea, a respected figure in the country’s powerful inner circles of intelligence and military leaders, is the most senior security figure confirmed dead in more than a year.
abstract: Maj Gen Jamea Jamea, one of Syrian government's most prominent intelligence officers, is killed during fighting in eastern provincial capital of Deir al-Zour; fact that such notable figure was commanding operations in area suggests that Pres Bashar al-Assad is still committing important resources to checking rebel advances in eastern Syria.

byline.original: By HWAIDA SAAD and ANNE BARNARD

lead_paragraph: Gen. Jamea Jamea, a respected figure in the country’s powerful inner circles of intelligence and military leaders, is the most senior security figure confirmed dead in more than a year.

headline.main: A Top Syrian Intelligence Officer Is Killed in Fighting
headline.print_headline: A Top Syrian Intelligence Officer Is Killed in Fighting

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
